name: Sniper Hunter Safari Survival
description:
Animal Hunter is here. If you're looking for a sniper game where you need to hunt for all kinds of animals, from wolves and deer to bears. Each level gives you a set of animals to shoot. Take your rifle. Set your scope and hunt!
In this game you will be able to ride on the SUV in the forest, drive on the Jungle off road track and find your target and hunt it using sniper Gun.
